title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Enhancing Difficult Conversation Management Skills for Adult Learners in the Workplace

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze difficult conversation scenarios and develop dialogue strategies by applying the six stages of the ORANGE framework (Observe, Respect, Assume, Navigate, Generate, Empower).
Learners can assess their communication styles using reflective tools and provide feedback that fosters psychological safety.
Learners can recreate conflict situations from real workplace environments through role-playing and derive collaborative problem-solving strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
